text:
🚨 BREAKING → Nancy Pelosi just unilaterally extended her proxy voting scheme for ANOTHER 45 DAYS.

As Americans get back to work, Dems extend their free pass to skip work altogether while a few Members vote multiple times for districts they don't even represent.

Unbelievable.
